text: "Dreaming" is a 1979 song by American band Blondie and is the opening track from their fourth album Eat to the Beat. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Canada, number 3 in Ireland, number 6 in Norway, number 9 in New Zealand and number 27 in the United States. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Blondie (band) songs Category:Green Day songs Category:The Smashing Pumpkins songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Dreaming (Blondie song)
